x-apigw-api-id.name: x-apigw-api-id
x-apigw-api-id.description:
API Gateway Rest API ID:
  * UAT - goiwi3vpib
  * PROD - a8pdjulkwe

channel.name: channel
channel.description:
Channel Code (Must be lower case):
  * mma
  * hra
  * hfa
  * mmb
  * ssp

cookie.name: cookie
cookie.description: Session Cookie from Digital ID, REQUIRED when accessToken and refreshToken is not provided

authCode.name: authCode
authCode.description: OIDC Auth Code. REQUIRED when cookie is not provided

accessToken.name: accessToken
accessToken.description: Access Token from OIDC, REQUIRED when cookie is not provided

refreshToken.name: refreshToken
refreshToken.description: Refresn Token from OIDC, REQUIRED when cookie is not provided

redirectUrl.name: redirectUrl
redirectUrl.description: Redirect Url, REQUIRED when using Auth Code

authorization.name: Authorization
authorization.description:
JWT Bearer Access Token:
  * NOTE - Must provide Bearer as the prefix. Ex. Bearer XXXXXXXXX

accountnumberlist.name: accountNumberList
accountnumberlist.description: Account Number List, use '|' to seperate multiple accounts. Ex. 1234567|123456778. By detault should the value should same with accountnumber. If require multiple account use '|' to seperate them.

rateplanname.name: ratePlanName
rateplanname.description: Rate Plan Name. (REQUIRED for roaming data pass)

isprincipal.name: isPrincipal
isprincipal.description: Principal indicator. (REQUIRED for roaming data pass)

isprime.name: isPrime
isprime.description: Is Prime data plan indicator. (REQUIRED for roaming data pass)

countryname.name: countryName
countryname.description: Country Name. (REQUIRED for roaming data pass)

amountincent.name: amount
amountincent.description: Amount (in CENT format ex. 200 is RM2)

type.name: type
type.description:
Roaming or Domestic type:
  * roaming - Roaming Data Passes
  * domestic - Domestic Data Passes

rateplanid.name: ratePlanId
rateplanid.description: Component ID or Product Offer's Base BOID

maxtransaction.name: maxTransaction
maxtransaction.description: Max. Number of payment transactions return from UXF

code.description:
Violation Codes:
  * -999 - There seems to be a problem performing your action, please try again.
  * 401 - Unauthorized
  100 - Please fill in required fields.
  * 101 - This email is invalid.
  * 102 - Please ensure your password is at least 8 characters long, has one upper & one lower case character, and include at least one number.
  * 103 - This email address already exist.
  * 104 - This email address is invalid.
  * 105 - There seems to be a problem performing your action, please try again.
  * 106 - Seems you dont have a Maxis ID. Sign up for one now.
  * 108 - This mobile number have been registered.
  * 109 - Please key in the correct TAC.
  * 112 - Please try again later.
  * 115 - Please try again later.
  * 117 - Please use a valid mobile number.
  * 118 - Please request for a new TAC.
  * 119 - Please use a valid Maxis number.
  * 120 - This IC number has been registered.
  * 121 - Please add an email address to proceed.
  * 122 - Please add a mobile number to proceed.
  * 124 - Information is invalid.
  * 128 - There seems to be a problem performing your action, please try again.
  * 134 - Seems you dont have a Maxis ID. Sign up for one now.
  * 135 - Please key in the correct TAC.
  * 139 - Please try again later.
  * 143 - This email address is invalid.
  * 144 - This email address already exist.
  * 145 - Invalid username.
  * 150 - The old password is incorrect.
  * 154 - There seems to be a problem performing your action, please try again.
  * 159 - There seems to be a problem performing your action, please try again.
  * 164 - This mobile number have already been added.
  * 166 - This mobile number have already been registered.
  * 168 - There seems to be something wrong. Please try again later.
  * 169 - There seems to be something wrong. Please try again later.
  * 173 - This mobile number have already been registered.
  * 174 - Please use a valid mobile number.
  * 181 - This TAC code has expired.
  * 182 - There seems to be something wrong. Please try again later.
  * 183 - There seems to be something wrong. Please try again later.
  * 184 - You've reach max no. of failed attempts. Account will be locked for 24 hours.
  * 185 - The IC provided does not match the IC registered to your mobile/account no.
  * 186 - In the process of linking your Maxis accounts, we discovered that you have an active Maxis mobile no. Kindly call 123 for assistance in linking your services.
  * 187 - You have reached the maximum no. of retries. Please request for a new TAC.
  * 188 - Your TAC has expired. Please request for a new TAC.
  * 189 - Either Guid or Cookie or Access Token is require.
  * 190 - Guid is require.
  * 1001 - Language Code  "languagecode" is required in the header.
  * 1002 - Either Cookie ("cookie") or Access Token ("access_token") is required in the header.
  * 1003 - Refresh Token ("refresh_token") is required in the header.
  * 1004 - Redirect Url ("redirectUrl") is required in the Query String.
  * 1005 - Refresh Token ("refresh_token") is required in the header.
  * 1006 - Access Token ("access_token") is required in the header.
  * 1007 - Channel ("maxis_channel_type") is required in the header.
  * 1008 - Failed to logout.

  * A = Active or Subscribe
  * N = Not Subscribe
  * P = Pending for email verification from user

PlanType.description:
Plan Type:
  * 0 = Base Plan
  * 1 = Quota Update Plan
  * 2 = Recurring Volume Plan
  * 3 = Time Based Plan
  * 4 = Recurring Experiental Plan
  * 5 = Non Recurring Experiental Plan
  * 6 = Speed Booster Plan
  * 7 = Group Base Plan
  * 8 = Group Quota UpgradePlan

paymentMethod.description: Payment method, will be null if isEnabled = false

packageType.description:
Package Type (REQUIRED when provisionType=PCC):
  * 1 = MI Flexi Data Package
  * 2 - MI PostpaidMonthly Package
  * 3 - MI Kiwi Package
  * 4 - Prepaid WBB
  * 5 - Postpaid WBB
  * 6 - Prepaid Blackberry
  * 7 - Data Roaming
  * 8 - MI Flexi Data Package with quota sharing (for consumer)
  * 9 - MI Postpaid Monthly Package with quota sharing (for consumer)
  * 333 - Provisioning, where wM will send SUBPASS or UNSUBPASS to Huawei PP instead of Tertio
  * 555 - Provisioning, where wM will send SUBPASS or UNSUBPASS to Huawei PP instead of Tertio

maxisId.description: Rate Plan ID or Component Id

planType.description:
Plan Type (Product Type in wM. REQUIRED when provisionType=PCC):
  * T - Non recurring (time based)
  * M - Recurring (monthly based)

preOrPostIndicator.description:
Prepaid or Postpaid Indicator (REQUIRED when provisionType=PCC):
  * PRE = Prepaid
  * POST = Postpaid

topic.description: Callback Kafka topic when calling order data pass. Order data microservice will receive callback from webMethod and microsevice will write the callback result to Kafka Topic. Is channel's responsibility to process the topic. Only applicable if you require callback processing. If not require callback processing, set the value to null.

transactionId.description: Transaction reference id to pass to Order data microservice for tracking purpose. If not require, pass in as 0

provisionType.description:
Provision Type:
  * HOTTICKET = Hotticket
  * PCC = PCC

actionType.description:
Action Type (REQUIRED when provistionType=PCC):
  * A - Activation
  * D - Deactivation (cancel auto renewal)
  * U - Upgrade
  * S - Switch Service profile (applicable for Prepaid, BB, Prepaid Blackberry)
  * F - First Activation (applicable for Prepaid BB)
  * T - Deactivation with terminate immediately / termInd=1 (For flexi,mthly data package & prepaid blackberry)

ratePlanId.description: Rate Plan ID or Product Offers's BOID

ratePlanType.description:
Rate Plan Type:
  * postpaid - for Postpaid
  * prepaid - for prepaid

type.description:
Plan Type:
  * domestic -  Domestic rate plan
  * roaming - Roaming rate plan

country.description: Country name. Required when checkEligibility=true and type=roaming. Else leave blank or ''

topic.description: Callback Kafka topic when calling order data pass. Order data microservice will receive callback from webMethod and microsevice will write the callback result to Kafka Topic. Is channel's responsibility to process the topic. Only applicable if you require callback processing. If not require callback processing, set the value to null.

transactionId.description: Transaction reference id to pass to Order data microservice for tracking purpose. If not require, pass in as 0

footnote.example:
Excludes Service Tax.
Internet passes are not shareable.

Top-up internet passes (except Auto-Renewal passes) are valid until your next billing cycle.

tnc.example:
•  Valid only on O2 UK/Vodafone (4G)

  •  No manual purchase is needed. Its auto subscribed by enabling data roaming on your device. RM38 will be charged to your account upon activation.

  •  List of data roaming pass for UK can be purchased below.

  •  Excludes Service Tax.
